Title: Improving bug management using correlations in crash reports
Elements_risk_assessment: they applied all the heuristics by SZZ to identify bug fix locations
UseOF-SZZ: to identify bugs and to compare how the defect-fixing changes are recorded
Summary: The aim is design a framework that automates the process of synchronizing and filling the gaps of the development logs and bug issue data for open source software projects.
Outcome: They propose an algorithm to locate and rank buggy files using crash correlation groups, also they propose a method to identify duplicate and related bug reports
